name: make
description:
Create a `DateTime` from one of the following: - A `DateTime`
- A `Date` instance (invalid dates will throw an `IllegalArgumentException`)
- The `number` of milliseconds since the Unix epoch
- An object with the parts of a date
- A `string` that can be parsed by `Date.parse` If the input is invalid, `None` will be returned.
documentation:
Create a `DateTime` from one of the following:

- A `DateTime`
- A `Date` instance (invalid dates will throw an `IllegalArgumentException`)
- The `number` of milliseconds since the Unix epoch
- An object with the parts of a date
- A `string` that can be parsed by `Date.parse`

If the input is invalid, `None` will be returned.
